text: Albertus “Bert” Schreuder (4 May 1929 - 30 January 2021) was a Dutch politician. He was mayor of Puttershoek from 1963 to 1971, Gorinchem from 1971 to 1982 and of Amersfoort from 1982 to 1994. He was a member of the Partij van de Arbeid (PvdA). Schreuder was born in Apeldoorn, Netherlands. Schreuder died on 30 January 2021 in Amersfoort, Netherlands at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dutch mayors Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:People from Apeldoorn Category:Politicians from Gelderland
title: Bert Schreuder
